scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:kill && uv run fastapi dev src/api/main.py --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.lint: which uv || curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && (uv tool list | grep -q ruff || uv tool install ruff) && uv tool run ruff check .
scripts.lint:fix: which uv || curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && (uv tool list | grep -q ruff || uv tool install ruff) && uv tool run ruff check --fix .
scripts.format: which uv || curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && (uv tool list | grep -q ruff || uv tool install ruff) && uv tool run ruff format .
